alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 12:54AM AKST until March 09 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility. Snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches are expected. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Northwest winds gusting to 30 mph. * WHERE...Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue into Thursday. Gusty winds and blowing snow will develop over Steese Highway Summits late tonight and continue through Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
